about

hi! i'm abby, i'm an artist, scientist, and enjoyer of colloquialisms.


the low-speed spoon is space i created as a place to house my portfolio of art, design, and data-vis projects. if you've found yourself here, i hope you enjoy poking around!


what is a low-speed spoon?


/loʊ spiːd spuːn/ noun


literally, a vernacular phrase referring to the smaller of two spoons included in a table setting, i.e., teaspoon. see high-speed spoon as an analog for 'dinner spoon'.
